UniprotID	Q9NST1
Accession	Q9NST1;B0QYI0;B2RCL3;B3KW00;Q6P1A1;Q96CB4
EntryName	PLPL3_HUMAN
ProteinName	1-acylglycerol-3-phosphate O-acyltransferase PNPLA3 (EC 2.3.1.51) (Acylglycerol transacylase) (Adiponutrin) (ADPN) (Calcium-independent phospholipase A2-epsilon) (iPLA2-epsilon) (EC 3.1.1.4) (Lysophosphatidic acid acyltransferase) (Patatin-like phospholipase domain-containing protein 3) (EC 3.1.1.3)
GeneName	PNPLA3 ADPN C22orf20
Length	481
Function	Specifically catalyzes coenzyme A (CoA)-dependent acylation of 1-acyl-sn-glycerol 3-phosphate (2-lysophosphatidic acid/LPA) to generate phosphatidic acid (PA), an important metabolic intermediate and precursor for both triglycerides and glycerophospholipids. Does not esterify other lysophospholipids. Acyl donors are long chain (at least C16) fatty acyl-CoAs: arachidonoyl-CoA, linoleoyl-CoA, oleoyl-CoA and at a lesser extent palmitoyl-CoA (PubMed:22560221). Additionally possesses low triacylglycerol lipase and CoA-independent acylglycerol transacylase activities and thus may play a role in acyl-chain remodeling of triglycerides (PubMed:15364929, PubMed:20034933, PubMed:22560221). In vitro may express hydrolytic activity against glycerolipids triacylglycerol, diacylglycerol and monoacylglycerol, with a strong preference for oleic acid as the acyl moiety (PubMed:21878620). However, the triacylglycerol hydrolase activity is controversial and may be very low (PubMed:22560221). Possesses phospholipase A2 activity (PubMed:15364929).
Subcellular Location	Membrane; Lipid droplet
Disorder	0.0676,0.0248,0.0263,0.0380,0.0202,0.0269,0.0157,0.0117,0.0151,0.0104,0.0086,0.0097,0.0111,0.0108,0.0108,0.0105,0.0104,0.0073,0.0076,0.0076,0.0115,0.0117,0.0181,0.0263,0.0269,0.0313,0.0191,0.0405,0.0780,0.0631,0.1323,0.1881,0.1162,0.0870,0.0870,0.0870,0.0799,0.0618,0.1184,0.1583,0.0967,0.0870,0.0414,0.0334,0.0263,0.0178,0.0174,0.0275,0.0263,0.0151,0.0214,0.0127,0.0163,0.0281,0.0646,0.0356,0.0483,0.0320,0.0227,0.0223,0.0294,0.0294,0.0198,0.0405,0.0662,0.0531,0.0835,0.1399,0.1476,0.1554,0.1583,0.1349,0.1373,0.0605,0.0555,0.0646,0.1115,0.0483,0.0799,0.0799,0.0817,0.0765,0.0631,0.0555,0.0555,0.0581,0.0734,0.0405,0.0214,0.0209,0.0113,0.0115,0.0133,0.0178,0.0380,0.0248,0.0205,0.0223,0.0269,0.0153,0.0244,0.0248,0.0248,0.0294,0.0518,0.0281,0.0253,0.0160,0.0269,0.0568,0.0356,0.0704,0.1275,0.1070,0.1424,0.1424,0.1424,0.0870,0.0531,0.0909,0.1611,0.0835,0.0870,0.0851,0.1476,0.1554,0.2575,0.1942,0.2094,0.2129,0.1731,0.1528,0.1048,0.0506,0.0506,0.0231,0.0115,0.0104,0.0184,0.0138,0.0096,0.0091,0.0157,0.0099,0.0072,0.0080,0.0085,0.0079,0.0067,0.0087,0.0084,0.0074,0.0104,0.0099,0.0115,0.0123,0.0214,0.0454,0.0543,0.0433,0.1007,0.1731,0.1251,0.1476,0.1298,0.1349,0.1206,0.0835,0.0851,0.1731,0.1759,0.1092,0.1671,0.1137,0.1759,0.2715,0.1554,0.0948,0.0967,0.1554,0.0967,0.0985,0.0531,0.0414,0.0414,0.0851,0.0967,0.0888,0.1070,0.1137,0.1162,0.0555,0.0581,0.0543,0.0555,0.0618,0.0294,0.0646,0.1070,0.0631,0.0555,0.0581,0.0531,0.0543,0.0592,0.0531,0.0543,0.0888,0.0543,0.0320,0.0188,0.0117,0.0209,0.0334,0.0275,0.0209,0.0138,0.0263,0.0300,0.0334,0.0341,0.0334,0.0380,0.0235,0.0398,0.0817,0.0433,0.0244,0.0148,0.0227,0.0389,0.0372,0.0372,0.0414,0.0341,0.0209,0.0424,0.0313,0.0168,0.0160,0.0168,0.0258,0.0269,0.0231,0.0231,0.0244,0.0218,0.0443,0.0870,0.1611,0.1643,0.1028,0.1671,0.2399,0.2258,0.2541,0.3910,0.3948,0.4725,0.5807,0.5951,0.5951,0.5139,0.4766,0.5342,0.6851,0.6661,0.5211,0.4541,0.4541,0.3840,0.3840,0.3807,0.4017,0.4017,0.4017,0.4330,0.4292,0.4256,0.4330,0.3872,0.2752,0.2224,0.2224,0.2
